rules_text: Blight {1}{W} [i](You can cast this from your graveyard transformed for {1}{W}. If you do, it enters under an opponent’s control. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
rules_text2:
When Desert’s Consumption enters, choose a creature you control to have it enchant.
Enchanted creature can’t attack or block and its activated abilities can’t be activated.
